name: Super Space Shooter (Daniel Stokoe)
description:
Created as part of a Game Design master's degree course in which a game prototype was to be made within a week based on a given theme or idea. For this task the game was to demonstrate some idea of operant condition through awarding the player during play, to provide a kind of compulsion loop.

With that brief I settled on a side scrolling top down shooter that upgraded the player's shooting power after destroying so many enemies, as depicted by a bar on the left of the screen.

Controls: Arrow keys to move, space bar to fire.

Art and sound assets taken from https://opengameart.org/ (can list in more detailed if required).

Created in Clickteam Fusion 2.5
